2.0.name: wordpress/station-pro
2.0.description:
THE STATION PRO, You can create a automation radio station, with support skins, player an theme.

Note: For Station Pro work is required a streaming server host wigh Ip and Port

Station Pro is free for personal and commercial user!

Including:

  • Security Listen
  • Support player: Winamp, Windows Media, Quik time, Realplayer
  • Players Theme settings
  • Skins Players theme support
  • Dock Ajax Players top
  • logfiles
  • multi language ability
  • uninstall routine
  • data delete routine (avoid orphaned data)
  • coding advices
